item.title: Welcome to Golang
item.description: Good Choice! If you’re a Java developer and your interest was piqued enough to come look at this page, then congratulations.

item.title: Go FAQs
item.description: Java libraries are “mature”, how can I be sure Go libraries can handle our needs? There are several things in Go’s corner here:
